videos.headline: Slovis finds Pittman for early USC TD
videos.description: Kedon Slovis throws a dart to Michael Pittman Jr. for an 8-yard score on the Trojans' opening drive.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Slovis finds Pittman for early USC TD) 2019/09/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: BYU's Wilgar makes incredible diving interception
videos.description: On third down, USC's Kedon Slovis has his pass intercepted by BYU's Payton Wilgar with a great effort.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (BYU's Wilgar makes incredible diving interception) 2019/09/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Defensive back pounds in BYU touchdown
videos.description: On 3rd-and-goal, BYU defensive back Dayan Ghanwoloku takes the handoff and hits pay dirt from a yard out.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Defensive back pounds in BYU touchdown) 2019/09/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Slovis gets picked off for second time
videos.description: USC's Kedon Slovis attempts to throw the ball over the BYU defense, but the pass gets picked off by Isaiah Kaufusi.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Slovis gets picked off for second time) 2019/09/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wilson's dime hits Milne for BYU TD
videos.description: Zach Wilson throws a deep ball to Dax Milne for a 30-yard touchdown to give BYU a 17-10 lead.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Wilson's dime hits Milne for BYU TD) 2019/09/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Malepeai finds the hole for 5-yard score
videos.description: Vavae Malepeai gets the handoff and shifts left towards the hole for a 5-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Malepeai finds the hole for 5-yard score) 2019/09/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: USC takes lead on reviewed touchdown
videos.description: USC's Michael Pittman Jr. catches a 30-yard touchdown pass from Kedon Slovis, which is reviewed because Pittman's foot had gone out of bounds.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (USC takes lead on reviewed touchdown) 2019/09/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: Wilson comes up huge on TD drive
videos.description: Zach Wilson evades pressure in the pocket and throws down field to Gunner Romney for a 35-yard gain. A play later, Wilson runs up the middle for a 16-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Wilson comes up huge on TD drive) 2019/09/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: BYU fans storm the field after game-winning INT
videos.description: USC's Kedon Slovis has his ball deflected and intercepted by Dayan Ghanwoloku in overtime, leading to BYU fans storming the field to celebrate.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (BYU fans storm the field after game-winning INT) 2019/09/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: BYU dances in locker room after OT win
videos.description: BYU coach Kalani Sitake and the Cougars dance in the locker room after beating USC 30-27 in overtime.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Misc (BYU dances in locker room after OT win) 2019/09/14
